subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Joe Blanton pitched effectively into the eighth inning for his first win with Los Angeles, and A. J. Ellis hit his first career grand slam in a 10-8 win over the Colorado Rockies on Wednesday.
snippet: Joe Blanton pitched effectively into the eighth inning for his first win with Los Angeles, and A. J. Ellis hit his first career grand slam in a 10-8 win over the Colorado Rockies on Wednesday.
